elements.name: 034_Adding a vehicle and verifying alert message that shows the vehicle is added

steps.name: Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language
verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM
click to Vehicles module
delete if a vehicle is added for test purpose ,Vehicle plate is "TE ST 3000"
click add vehicle button
fill in the input boxes of "TE ST 3000" , "Mercedes" , "A3","LKW","2012" "2015" , "100000" and "20000"
click save changes in vehicles edit page
verify alert message text is "Vehicle was added successfully.."

elements.name: 035_Adding a vehicle and verifying added vehicle data is seen if we use filters and the data is seen in vehicle list page

click add vehicle button
fill in the input boxes of "TE ST 3000" , "Mercedes" , "A3","LKW","2012" "2015" , "50000" and "10000"
click save changes in vehicles edit page
verify alert message text is "Vehicle was added successfully.."
verify you are in Vehicle Details Page
verify the data is visible "TE ST 3000" , "Mercedes" , "A3","LKW","2012" "2015" , "50000" and "10000"

delete if a vehicle is added for test purpose ,Vehicle plate is "TE ST 3000"

fill in the input boxes of "TE ST 3000" , "Mercedes" , "A3","LKW","2012" "2015" , "100000" and "20000"
click save changes in vehicles edit page

change Brand to "Toyota"
change Model to "X40"

verify the changed row headers have values in vehicle details page like below:
